com.camerontec.catalys.util.recovery

Class RecoveryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.util.recovery.RecoveryManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRecoveryManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LogRecoveryManager

    public abstract class RecoveryManager
extends Object
implements IRecoveryManager
    Wraps up a recovery in a lock which can be wait'ed on.
